name: The Colour Game
description:
The computer picks 5 out of the 8 colours and puts them in an order.

To win, you have to find the 5 colours picked and arrange them in the same way as the computer did.

After each guess you make (one guess consists of you choosing 5 out of the 8 colours on the bottom of the screen and putting them in an order of your choice), the computer will give you a feedback:
• Black circles represent right colours in the right spot.
• White circles represent right colours in the wrong spot.
The total number of circles is equal to the number of right colours in your guess.

With the knowledge gained from the feedback, you will eventually be able to work out the right
combination of colours and recreate the computer's pick.

In a nutshell:
You need 5 black circles to win!

Have fun playing and good luck! :)
